sentences.en: Groundwater is an important indiscerptible part of the whole water environment.
sentences.cn: 地下水是水环境不可分割且十分重要的一部分.

sentences.en: Groundwater overexploitation rapidly reduced the water table and runoff as a consequence.
sentences.cn: 超采地下水导致地下水位下降,引起地表径流量显著减少.

sentences.en: In Florida, farmers are squaring off against cities for rights to groundwater.
sentences.cn: 在佛罗里达州，农民正摆好架势，准备和城市争夺地下水的使用权。

sentences.en: Increased consumption of water has led to rapid depletion of groundwater reserves.
sentences.cn: 用水量的增加导致了地下水贮备迅速枯竭.

sentences.en: It couples the groundwater flow equation with the solute - transport equation.
sentences.cn: 它把地下水流动方程与溶质输运方程耦合在一起.

sentences.en: Radon concentration in groundwater was measured at 18 points including two continuous recording stations.
sentences.cn: 测量了包括两个连续记录台站在内共18个点的地下水的氡浓度.

sentences.en: Shijiazhuang is a representative city for the study of groundwater salt pollution.
sentences.cn: 石家庄市地下水盐污染研究具有典型示范性.

sentences.en: The buoyancy of groundwater makes adverse effects to stability of foundation.
sentences.cn: 地下水的浮力对基础的稳定有不利的影响.

sentences.en: The concept holds that uranium is leached by groundwater from tuffeceous rocks.
sentences.cn: 该理论认为,来自凝灰岩的地下水淋蚀铀.

sentences.en: The deep oxidation and groundwater leaching solubilizes much of the loosely bound uranium.
sentences.cn: 深部氧化和地下水淋蚀使大部分固定得比较松散的铀溶解.

sentences.en: The groundwater is only feet beneath the city streets.
sentences.cn: 地下河距离上面的城市街道只有几英尺。

sentences.en: The methods of protection of groundwater from salinization and pollution are proposed.
sentences.cn: 针对城镇用地不合理造成的地下水污染问题,提出了用地建议.

sentences.en: The time sequence model synthetically reflects trends of groundwater level.
sentences.cn: 总体来说,季节性时序模型的模拟和预测精度较高.

sentences.en: There are fears that groundwater might become contaminated.
sentences.cn: 有人担心地下水可能会遭污染。

sentences.en: This phenomenon can be utilized for the location of flowing groundwater by applying geothermal methods.
sentences.cn: 这个现象可以利用来用地热方法圈定流动的地下水.

sentences.en: Water resources shortage and groundwater mining are serious in Shanxi Province.
sentences.cn: 山西省水资源严重短缺,地下水超采严重.

phrases.tran_cn: 地下水位；地下水面；潜水面

trans.tran_en: water that is below the ground
